feed.title: Trend Business and Market
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: The European Explorer: Unveiling TUI's Profit Surprises and Summer Travel Bookings
entry.summary: In the world news, European tour operator TUI has surpassed profit expectations due to strong summer travel bookings. Additionally, Impact has announced its acquisition of the remaining equity in area 2 offshore South Africa, further expanding its presence in the oilfield technology sector. The Supreme Court has issued a stay on the Appellate Tribunal order that approved the BCCI settlement in the Byju's insolvency case. Furthermore, there has been a 2.5% dip in domestic wholesales of passenger vehicles in July. Mars is set to acquire Kellanova for approximately $30 billion, according to a reliable source. Thyssenkrupp is currently engaged in positive discussions with Carlyle and KfW regarding the sale of its warship unit. In a significant development, the CEO of Dubai airport has announced that soon passengers will no longer be required to show passports when entering or exiting the UAE. Lastly, Asian bonds have attracted substantial inflows due to the US rate outlook and strong exports.
